description: I have tried prettier apps to make sure I move enough on a workday, but found them to be too obtrusive.
summary: Configurable and unobtrusive. It is my favorite tool for the job

description: Nos obliga a hacer pequeñas pausas estratégicas. Antes tenía calambres y fatiga, y ahora todo mejoró.
It is quite useful for the pomodoro technique
summary: A must have, health and productivity
